title: Teachers' Day Tribute
description: Honour Dr. S. Radhakrishnan and celebrate teachers across India.
captions:
📚 A teacher takes a hand, opens a mind, and touches a heart.

This #TeachersDay, let’s thank the mentors who inspire us every day. 🙏
aim: Celebrate educators and connect with students/parents

title: Onam Festive Cheers
description: Celebrate Kerala’s biggest festival – Onam with pookalam, sadhya, and joy.
captions:
🌸 Onam brings colours, flavours, and togetherness.

From beautiful pookalams to the grand sadhya feast — it’s a celebration of Kerala’s spirit. 🌿
aim: Culturally connect with South Indian audiences

title: International Literacy Day
description: Promote education and awareness on Literacy Day.
captions:
✏️ Education is the passport to the future.

This #LiteracyDay, let’s spread knowledge and light the way for generations to come. 🌍

title: World Ozone Day
description: Raise awareness about protecting the ozone layer.
captions:
🌍 Protect the ozone, protect the planet.

On #WorldOzoneDay, let’s commit to a cleaner and greener tomorrow. 🌱

title: Engineers’ Day Celebration
description: Pay tribute to engineers and Dr. Mokshagundam Visvesvaraya.
captions:
⚙️ Engineers build dreams, brick by brick, code by code.

This #EngineersDay, let’s salute the innovators shaping our future. 🚀

title: World Peace Day
description: Highlight the message of peace and unity.
captions:
☮️ Peace begins with a smile.

On this #InternationalDayOfPeace, let’s spread kindness and unity. 🌎

title: Navratri Begins
description: Celebrate nine nights of devotion and dance.
captions:
✨ Navratri — nine nights of devotion, colours, and dance!

From garba to fasting, let’s welcome Maa Durga with open hearts. 🙏

title: World Pharmacists Day
description: Celebrate pharmacists for their role in healthcare.
captions:
💊 From research to care, pharmacists make a difference.

This #WorldPharmacistsDay, we thank them for being the backbone of healthcare. ❤️
